db:abstract.db:para: Shows you how to customize different visual properties of a ChartView and a series.

db:note.db:para: This is part of the Charts with QML Gallery example.

db:article.db:para: Here we show you how to create a wheel of fortune by customizing a pie series.
First we create the ChartView and a couple of series.

When the wheel of fortune has stopped, we make the active slice blink by modifying its colors.
